p: Different model variants were considered by fixing various combinations of parameters α, β and γ to zero. Starting with the null model ( α = 0, β = 0, γ = 0), distance only ( β = 0, γ = 0) and population only ( α = 0, γ = 0) models, original gravity model ( γ = 0), and for each climate factor: model without human mobility ( α = 0, β = 0) and the full model.
